announcements.name: Quidditch Tryouts Scheduled!
announcements.description: Hufflepuff Quidditch tryouts will be held this Saturday at 10 AM on the main pitch. Bring your broomsticks and plenty of energy!

announcements.name: New Beater Needed!
announcements.description: Our team is looking for a new Beater to replace Zacharias Smith. Come show your skills this Friday after classes!

announcements.name: Practice Cancelled Due to Rain
announcements.description: Today’s practice has been cancelled due to severe weather conditions. Stay dry and study up on Quidditch strategies!

announcements.name: Victory Celebration!
announcements.description: Congratulations to the Hufflepuff Quidditch team for defeating Ravenclaw! Join us in the common room tonight at 8 PM for butterbeer and snacks.

announcements.name: Quidditch Jerseys Are In!
announcements.description: Our new Quidditch jerseys have arrived! Stop by the equipment room after lunch to collect yours. Go Badgers!

announcements.name: Strategy Meeting This Evening
announcements.description: Team captains will hold a strategy meeting at 6 PM in the library. All players are required to attend.

announcements.name: Cheering Charms Practice
announcements.description: Hufflepuff supporters! Learn cheering charms this Thursday with Professor Flitwick to help motivate the team during matches.

announcements.name: Final Match of the Season
announcements.description: The final Quidditch match of the season against Gryffindor is this Saturday. Let’s show the whole school what Hufflepuff can do!

announcements.name: Broomstick Maintenance Reminder
announcements.description: Players, ensure your broomsticks are in top condition before practice tomorrow. Madam Hooch will be inspecting them at 9 AM.

announcements.name: Team Photo Day
announcements.description: Wear your jerseys and meet on the Quidditch pitch at 3 PM sharp for the team photo. Smiles and snitches!
